source-layers.sql:
SELECT * FROM (
              SELECT *, CASE
                WHEN SUBSTRING(zonedist, 3, 1) = '-' THEN LEFT(zonedist, 2)
                WHEN SUBSTRING(zonedist, 3, 1) ~ E'[A-Z]' THEN LEFT(zonedist, 2)
                WHEN SUBSTRING(zonedist, 3, 1) ~ E'[0-9]' THEN LEFT(zonedist, 3)
                ELSE zonedist
              END as primaryzone FROM zoning_districts_v201808
            ) a

meta.description: NYC GIS Zoning Features June 2018, Bytes of the Big Apple
